tool_description: Tests USB ports for functionality, power delivery, data transfer capability, and identifies faulty or damaged ports.

port_count.description: Total number of USB ports to test

error_messages: Invalid port count: Port count must be between 1-20.
Invalid USB versions: Use USB2.0, USB3.0, USB3.1, USB3.2, or USB-C.
No test device available: USB test device required for comprehensive testing.
usage: Specify port_count and usb_versions array. Enable test_power_delivery and test_data_transfer for complete USB port analysis.

working_ports.description: Number of fully functional USB ports

port_details.description: Detailed status of each USB port
